local_intent: Perceive the white plate, approach and align, close gripper with validated grasp
assumptions: White plate is within reachable workspace
Previous navigation to a safe approach pose is possible
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'grasp' phase of the global tree: detects the white plate, moves and aligns to it, performs CloseGripper with force 20, and verifies stability. Timeouts and tolerances use allowed bins and match the global plan.
